title: sha数据维度对不上
body:
```
loss.py:431: UserWarning: Using a target size (torch.Size([690, 1024])) that is different to the input size (torch.Size([696, 1024])). This will likely lead to incorrect results due to broadcasting. Please ensure they have the same size

File "train.py", line 63, in <module>
    cc_trainer.forward()
  File "/data/share/imageAlgorithm/zhangcheng/code/C-3-Framework/trainer.py", line 65, in forward
    self.train()
  File "/data/share/imageAlgorithm/zhangcheng/code/C-3-Framework/trainer.py", line 94, in train
    pred_map = self.net(img, gt_map)
  File "/home/zhangcheng/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 541, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/data/share/imageAlgorithm/zhangcheng/code/C-3-Framework/models/CC.py", line 40, in forward
    self.loss_mse= self.build_loss(density_map.squeeze(), gt_map.squeeze())
  File "/data/share/imageAlgorithm/zhangcheng/code/C-3-Framework/models/CC.py", line 45, in build_loss
    loss_mse = self.loss_mse_fn(density_map, gt_data)
  File "/home/zhangcheng/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 541, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/zhangcheng/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/loss.py", line 431, in forward
    return F.mse_loss(input, target, reduction=self.reduction)
  File "/home/zhangcheng/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 2203, in mse_loss
    expanded_input, expanded_target = torch.broadcast_tensors(input, target)
  File "/home/zhangcheng/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/functional.py", line 52, in broadcast_tensors
    return torch._C._VariableFunctions.broadcast_tensors(tensors)
RuntimeError: The size of tensor a (680) must match the size of tensor b (674) at non-singleton dimension 0


```
我检查了一遍啥数据集中的图片和对应csv的维度都是对的上，但是训练一起来就会提示我维度对不上
